post.text: Fighting for kids in foster care has been one of the causes of Hillary's career, all the way back to her days in law school.

comment.author: Tomasz
comment.text: You have NO PROBLEM killing babies in late term abortions...when we ALL know that they are able to live outside the mother's womb at 7..8..9 months...yet you are willing to take their life...you are SCUM AT BEST and SHOULD BE IN PRISON! #FloridForTrump

replies.author: Tori
replies.text: Hillary is a light being and so all these dark soul trolls can't see it, and even HATE the light. Isn't that pitiful? Then, when you call them on their darkness, their next trick is to try and confound you by re-wording and confusing you. But people of the light have been moving forward, growing and evolving all this time, while these dark trolls have remained stuck in the same ruts. That's why they don't have anything new to say. What an awful life. I'm glad and honored and grateful that I already VOTED EARLY for #ClintonKaine and voted BLUE all the way down the ballot!!!!!!!

replies.author: Jacob
replies.text: Tori fake account. Does anyone else find it interesting the Obama hasn't said a word about the FBI reopening the case.... It's drop, tuck and roll right about now... Get outa the way of the fallout!!!!
